scripts.postinstall: mkdir -p public/cesium && cp -R node_modules/cesium/Build/Cesium/Assets public/cesium/Assets && cp -R node_modules/cesium/Build/Cesium/Widgets public/cesium/Widgets && cp -R node_modules/cesium/Build/Cesium/ThirdParty public/cesium/ThirdParty && cp -R node_modules/cesium/Build/Cesium/Workers public/cesium/Workers
